Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Iye anachita matsinya ndi kuyang’ana kumbali
Chifukwa munthu wakhungu anadza kwa iye
Ndipo iwe ungadziwe bwanji kuti mwina angadziyeretse
Kapena iye adzalandira chenjezo ndipo chenjezo likanamupindulira kanthu kena
Koma iye amene amadziyesa kuti sasowa kanthu
Ameneyo ndiye amene uli naye ndi chidwi
Kodi uli nazo chiani ngati iye sadziyeretsa
Koma kwa iye amene amakuthamangira
Ndipo iye amaopa
Iwe siudamulabadire ayi
Iyayi! Ndithudi chimenechi ndi chikumbutso
Muloleni aliyense amene afuna kuti achilabadire
Ichi chidalembedwa m’Buku la Mulungu lolemekezeka
Loyeretsedwa ndi losungidwa bwino ndi loyera
M’manja mwa Alembi
Wolemekezeka ndipo womvera
Atembereredwe munthu! Kodi ndi chiani chili kumuletsa kuthokoza
Kodi Iye adamulenga kuchokera ku chiyani
Kuchokera ku dontho la umuna, Iye adamulenga ndipo adamukonza bwino
Ndipo Iye adamukonzera iye njira yapafupi
Ndipo amamupha ndi kumusunga m’manda
Ndithudi Iye adzamudzutsa monga momwe afunira
Iyayi, koma munthu sanachite zimene Iye adamulamulira
Mulekeni munthu kuti aganize za chakudya chake
Kuti Ife timagwetsa mvula yambiri
Ndipo timaphwanya nthaka
Ndipo Ife Al-Takwir	641 timameretsa njere
Mphesa ndi Msipu
Mitengo ya mafuta, ndi mitengo ya tende
Ndi minda imene ili ndi mitengo yambiri
Ndi mitengo ya zipatso ndi msipu
Chakudya cha inu ndi ziweto zanu
Koma pamene kulira kogonthetsa mkhutu kudzamveka
Patsiku limene munthu adzakana m’bale wake
Amai ake ndi bambo ake
Mkazi wake ndi ana ake
Chifukwa aliyense patsiku limeneli, adzakhala otangwanika ndi mavuto ake
Patsiku limeneli padzakhala nkhope zambiri zowala
Zosekerera ndi zachimwemwe chifukwa cha nkhani yabwino
Ndipo pa tsikuli padzakhala nkhope zina zokutidwa ndi fumbi
M’dima udzakuta iwo
Awa adzakhala anthu osakhulupirira ndi ochita zoipa
Pamene dzuwa lidzavundikiridwa
Ndi pamene nyenyezi zidzagwa pansi
Ndi pamene mapiri adzachotsedwa
Ndi pamene ngamila zabele zizakhala zosasamalidwa
Ndi nyama za m’tchire zidzasonkhanitsidwa pamodzi
Ndi pamene nyanja zidzayatsidwa moto kapena zidzasefukira
Ndi pamene mizimu idzakumanitsidwa ndi matupi awo
Ndi pamene mwana wa mkazi wa mng’ono, amene adaundilidwa wa moyo adzafunsidwa
Chifukwa chimene anamuphera
Ndi pamene mabuku olembamo ntchito za munthu aliyense adzatulutsidwa
Ndi pamene kumwamba kudzafafanizidwa ndi kuchotsedwa ku malo ake
Ndi pamene Gahena idzatenthetsedwa kwambiri
Ndi pamene Paradiso idzafikitsidwa pafupi
Ndithudi munthu aliyense adzadziwa chimene adachita
Motero, ndithudi, Ine ndili kulumbira pali nyenyezi zimene zimalowa
Ndi pali maiko zimene zimayenda mofulumira ndi kudzibisa okha
Ndi pali usiku pamene uchoka
Ndipalim’mawapamenekulikucha
Ndithudi awa ndi Mau a Mtumwi wolemekezeka
Mwini mphamvu amene amalemekezedwa ndi Ambuye, Mwini Mpando wa Chifumu
Amamveredwa ndi wokhulupirika
Ndipo m’bale wanu uyu si wa misala ayi
Ndipo, ndithudi, iye adamuona iye mu mlengalenga
Iye sabisa zinthu zosaoneka
Ndipo zimene alankhula sizochokera kwa Satana wotembereredwa
Kodi inu muli kupita kuti
Ndithudi ichi si china chilichonse ayi koma chikumbutso kwa anthu a mitundu yonse
Kwa aliyense wa inu amene afuna kuyenda moongoka
Koma inu simungathe kutero pokhapokha ndi chifuniro cha Mulungu, Ambuye wa zolengedwe zonse
